[7]{00}Mirror B. is at [MsgID 77]![Dialogue End]

[7]{00}Krane Memo 1
Re: The Snag System[Clear Window]Shadow Pokémon are victims of criminals who
use them for misdeeds.
They must be taken from their bad masters and
protected.[Clear Window]The most effective means of taking such
Pokémon from criminals is the Snag System
developed by Cipher five years ago.[Clear Window]It is an unforgivable act among Trainers to
steal another Trainer's Pokémon, but there is
no other way to save Shadow Pokémon.[Clear Window]The Snag System was originally designed to
steal any Pokémon from Trainers.[Clear Window]We must immediately develop a system that
snags only Shadow Pokémon...and nothing
else.[Dialogue End]

[7]{00}Krane Memo 2
Re: The Aura Reader[Clear Window]It is impossible for ordinary people to distinguish
Shadow Pokémon from regular Pokémon based
on appearance.[Clear Window]In developing a new Snag System, our biggest
challenge was devising some means of 
recognizing Shadow Pokémon immediately.[Clear Window]We solved this challenge with a headset device
that senses Shadow Pokémon.[Clear Window]We named this headset the Aura Reader.[Dialogue End]

[7]{00}Krane Memo 3
Re: The Snag Machine[Clear Window]The Aura Reader's development made it
possible to create a workable new Snag
Machine.[Clear Window]We realized that we could integrate the Aura
Reader with the original Snag Machine
developed by Cipher.[Clear Window]The Aura Reader can be made to sound
a warning and prevent the Snag Machine from
working if a regular, non- Shadow Pokémon is
targeted.[Clear Window]The likelihood of the Snag Machine being
abused should be diminished.
However, one must always be vigilant.
It must be treated with caution![Dialogue End]

[7]{00}Krane Memo 4
Re: Purification[Clear Window]Once captured,Shadow Pokémon must have
their hearts reopened in a process called
purification so that they may return to their
normal state.[Clear Window]The best-known method of purification was to
have the Shadow Pokémon spend time with
a Trainer and allow their hearts to gradually
reopen.[Clear Window]However, because it required Shadow Pokémon
to be with the Trainer, this method placed
a limit on the number of Pokémon that could be
treated.[Clear Window]We needed a process for efficiently purifying
many Shadow Pokémon.
Our studies led us to the idea of the Purify
Chamber.[Dialogue End]

[7]{00}Krane Memo 5
Re: The Purify Chamber[Clear Window]The Purify Chamber is a radical new concept
that differs from the usual purification method of
having Shadow Pokémon be with a Trainer
constantly.[Clear Window]It represents a new approach that places
Shadow Pokémon among regular Pokémon
so that they become purified naturally.[Clear Window]Much time is still needed to make this concept
real.
We need to acquire systems, collect data,
and make adjustments.[Clear Window]We eagerly look forward to seeing the Purify
Chamber concept in operation.[Dialogue End]
